scenarios.selectQuery: SELECT UP.ID, UP.NAME, UP.VALUE, U.USERNAME, UP.CREATED_AT FROM USER_PREFERENCES UP JOIN USERS U ON U.ID=UP.USER_ID WHERE NOT NAME='DEFAULT_DASHBOARD';
scenarios.insertQuery: INSERT INTO USER_PREFERENCES(ID, NAME, VALUE, USER_ID, CREATED_AT) VALUES (:ID, :NAME, :VALUE, (SELECT ID FROM USERS WHERE USERNAME=:USERNAME), :CREATED_AT) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;
